hero.description: GitButler is the Git-backed change management tool for modern, AI coding workflows. Parallel and stacked branches, unlimited undo, agent integrations, and more. It's Git, reimagined.

main-features.title: Parallel Branches
main-features.description: You donâ€™t need to switch or stash branches if you can work on several simultaneously. Fix your bug while you work on your feature.

main-features.title: Stacked Branches
main-features.description: Break a big feature into small, dependent branches, making reviews faster and integrations incremental.

main-features.title: AI Assistance
main-features.description: No more 'did some stuff' commits. Let AI handle the busywork: generate branch names, commit messages, and PR descriptions automatically.

main-features.title: Unlimited Undo
main-features.description: GitButler makes a snapshot before every operation, allowing you to go back in time to any previous point without fear of losing anything.

main-features.title: Commit Editing
main-features.description: Easily edit, reorder, squash, or split commits in any branch, even after pushing to remote. Never wrestle with rebase again.

main-features.title: Git(Hub|Lab) Integration
main-features.description: Open Pull Requests, generate PR messages with AI, automatically check PR statuses and more with our forge integrations.

ai-features.title: Built in Claude Code GUI
ai-features.description: Run Claude Code in our integrated Agents Tab, a beautiful graphical interface for your Claude agents.

ai-features.title: Parallel, Branch Based Agents
ai-features.description: Launch multiple agents in parallel, separating context and work into assigned branches, all in a single working directory.

ai-features.title: Integrate with any Agent
ai-features.description: Use GitButler for you automatic version control with Cursor or Claude hooks, or with any other agent via our MCP server.
